---
drake_cache: ".ui"
dependencies: "dependencies"
output:
  html_tag:
    filename: "index.html"
    dirpath: "`r library(econR); .r %//% 'docs'`"
    object: "ui"
---


```{r makecondition}
library(dplyr)
library(shiny)
library(htmltools)
library(econR)

```

```{r dependencies}
dependencies <- {
  myown_deps <- htmltools::htmlDependency(
      name="myown",
      version="1.0.0",
      src=c(file= .r %//% "assets"),
      script = "js/myscript.js",
      stylesheet="css/mystyle.css"
    )
  econR_deps <- econR::html_dependencies()
  tagList(
    econR_deps$jquery(),
    econR_deps$materialise(),
    myown_deps
  )
}
```


## =======================

### Input

```{r input_bins}
input_bins <- sliderInput("bins",
                        "Number of bins:",
                        min = 1,
                        max = 50,
                        value = 30)
```

  * Given label `input_bins` defined in the code chunk setup, `input_bins <-` can be ignored if you like.
  
### Output

```{r output_distPlot}
output_distPlot <- shiny::plotOutput("distPlot")
```

## =======================

### UI

```{r ui}
ui <- tags$body(
  fluidPage(

    # Application title
    titlePanel("UI from ui.Rmd: Old Faithful Geyser Data"),

    # Sidebar with a slider input for number of bins 
    sidebarLayout(
        sidebarPanel(
            input_bins
        ),

        # Show a plot of the generated distribution
        mainPanel(
           output_distPlot
        )
    )
))
```
